messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will constitute a pushed skill roll in this situation?
A failed attempt to lift the rafter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many successes were needed to lift the rafter?
One success
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the difficulty level of a skill roll after reducing an opponent's characteristic?
An Extreme, Hard, or Regular difficulty level, as determined by the new value of the opposing characteristic.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a skill roll be avoided by reducing an opponent's characteristic to zero or lower?
No, a skill roll is always required.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the rule about physical challenges?
The opposition cannot be reduced to zero or lower by this method; a skill roll is always required.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does a Critical Success in combat mean?
The attacker has hit a vulnerable spot and causes maximum damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of a critical success in combat?
The attacker has hit a vulnerable spot and causes maximum damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of rolling a very high or very low dice roll?
Good or bad fortune for the players.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the nature of good fortune in the game?
The Keeper's discretion, although the players may make suggestions.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Captain Marsh known for bringing back in the 1830s?
Fabled items
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a fumble in the game system?
A fumble is a misfortune that occurs when the dice roll required for success is 50 or over and the dice read 100, or when the dice roll required for success is below 50 and the dice read 96—100
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when Brian encounters a ghoul and fails his Sanity roll?
He automatically takes the maximum Sanity point loss for seeing the ghoul
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a fumble to occur when the dice roll required for success is 50 or over?
If the dice roll required for success is 50 or over and the dice read 100
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a fumble to occur when the dice roll required for success is below 50?
If the dice roll required for success is below 50 and the dice read 96—100
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the highest roll required to fumble with Harvey's skill?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the difficulty level required for a fumble roll when searching in the dark?
Hard (27)
